caption.p: (a) Nyquist plots of MnO@C nanocomposites as LIB anodes, for the direct growth method (red curve) and the post-coating method (black curve). (b) Nyquist plots of MnO@C nanocomposites as supercapacitor anodes, for the direct growth method (red curve), the post-coating method (black curve), and after removal of carbon coating for the direct grown thin films (blue curve). Inset: close up of the high frequency region.
